headline: AI Chips Update - AlphaTON Invests $82.5M In Nvidia-Powered AI Expansion
summary: AlphaTON Capital has announced a strategic investment of $82.5 million to acquire and deploy a high-performance GPU cluster featuring over 1,000 Nvidia B200 GPUs. This initiative supports Telegram's Cocoon AI, a privacy-preserving decentralized AI network, and positions AlphaTON as a significant compute provider. The investment aligns with efforts to foster user data sovereignty and environmentally responsible AI development. This move highlights a broader trend toward democratizing AI access...
